author: Mary Berry
method: Blend all of the cranberry sauce ingredients in a food processor until smooth.  Either serve cold or gently heat through. Serve with roast turkey or leftover cold cuts.
ingredients: 225g/8oz fresh cranberries,  150g/5½oz caster sugar,  1 small, thin-skinned orange, cut into quarters, pips removed,  ½ tsp mixed spice,  pinch freshly grated nutmeg
